mood: Sweeping epilogue across deep time. Melancholic beauty of divergence. Celebration of variety. Philosophical satisfaction. Warm acceptance of change. Honor and memory across millennia. Not triumphant but satisfied. Not joyful but content. Beautiful strange multitude of futures. Grateful acknowledgment of sacrifice. Completion without closure—futures still unfolding.
pacing: Three distinct time periods. Slow progression through millennia. Each section showing different stage of divergence. Building toward reunion/federation. Pilgrimage to Lira's grave as emotional culmination. Final reflection on trilogy's meaning. Epilogue rhythm—contemplative, sweeping, conclusive.
chapter_purpose: RESOLUTION - Show long-term consequences of silence choice. Demonstrate predictions were accurate (1000 years incomprehensibility, 10,000 speciation). Reveal 18 human species thriving. Federation established (cooperation without unity). Honor Lira's sacrifice across deep time. Validate all costs were worth survival and diversity. Complete trilogy arc: unified → isolated → diversified → federated. Celebrate human-plural as success. Partnership with Threadkeepers as equals. Ultimate vindication: Lira was right about everything.
